div.p: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

This afternoon, i went to a business cocktail at the Plaza Hotel. I never heard about this kind of event before. My friend invited me and i was surprised by the concept. When i was there, i had the opportunity to meet business men, politicans up to networking around a cup of wine. It was a good experience for me to make contacts. I'm happy to share with you this story. For who interested, it will be a pleasure to tell you when the next event will take place.
